name: Purp vs Green Goons DEMO
description:
Your Name  is: Purp.

Your Age is: 22

Your City is: Getting destroyed...

Will you just sit down and watch it all go down the rails?... NO

Sometimes you have to make justice with your own hands for the greater good. and Purp had enough of those people corrupting the world he was given life on. 

Will you get rid of all evil?.. or the evil its us all along...
